Package it.polimi.ingsw.game_controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.game_controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<GameAction>
public class GameController extends Object implements Observer<GameAction>
Class to model the game controller.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(Game game)

  • Method Details

    • createPlayer

      public Player createPlayer(String name, DeckType type)
      Create a new player object with the given name and assigning him the given deck.
      Parameters:
      name - the player nickname.
      type - the deck type chosen by the player.
      Returns:
      the player object created with the given params.
      See Also:
      • Player
      • DeckType

    • addPlayer

      protected void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a player to the list of players, then it checks whether the game is full or not. If the maximum player capacity has been reached, it starts the game.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to be added to the game's player list
      See Also:
      • Player

    • start

      public final void start()
      Handle the game initial status. Before the game starts:
      1. create next Planning phase order
      2. Gameboard setup
      3. play a Turn

    • selectAssistantCard

      public void selectAssistantCard(String playerName, int assistantIndex)
      This function will be called when a player as chosen which Assistant card to play. It notifies the game model which card as been chosen and then tries to play the next planning phase.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player who request the action.
      assistantIndex - the played assistant card.

    • playerMoveStudentToIsland

      public void playerMoveStudentToIsland(String playerName, int student, int islandNumber)
      Given the player name which made the move, the index of the student of his entrance he wants to move and the island index, it moves the selected student to the selected island if it's the player's turn, otherwise it sends a NOT_YOUR_TURN error message.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the nickname of the player who made the move.
      student - the student index in the player's entrance which has to be moved.
      islandNumber - the index of the island on which to move the student.

    • playerMoveStudentToDiningHall

      public void playerMoveStudentToDiningHall(String playerName, int student)
      Given the player who made the move and the student to move on the dining hall

        if:
      • It's the player's turn
      • The game is in ACTION phase
      • Student's dining hall isn't full
        • moves selected student to dining hall

        Otherwise notify what condition of the above is missing
      Parameters:
      playerName - name of player who made the move
      student - student to move on dining hall

    • moveMotherNatureOfSteps

      public void moveMotherNatureOfSteps(String playerName, int numberOfSteps)
      Given the max possible steps, it lets the user choose how many steps mother nature has to do, and then it moves her.
      Parameters:
      playerName - : the player who called the action
      numberOfSteps - : selected steps that mother nature has to perform

    • choseCloud

      public void choseCloud(String playerName, int cloudCardIndex)
      Given the player who made the move and index of the cloud card, move students on the cloud card to the player's entrance.
        the controller notify to the view if
      • the player try to make the move not in their turn
      • player try to make the move not in action phase
      • player try to select an empty cloud card
      Parameters:
      playerName - player who made the move
      cloudCardIndex - index of the cloud card selected by the player
      See Also:
      • CloudCard
      • Player

    • playAdvancedCard

      public void playAdvancedCard(String playerName, AdvancedCharacterType cardType, Object... args)
      Given a player who wants to play an advanced card, check if the player match all the conditions to play the selected card, notify if any condition is missing, then play the card.
      Parameters:
      playerName - Player who made the move
      cardType - selected advanced card
      args - args of the selected advanced card to play

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Get the current player playing whether the game is in action phase or in planning phase

    • getAvailableDeckType

      public List<DeckType> getAvailableDeckType()
      Manage to give each player a deck type from the 4 available, when a deck type is given, other players will ù have different deck types.
      Returns:
      list of deck types assigned.

    • update

      public void update(GameAction action)
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<GameAction>
